original_text: Then they fixed four rows of jewels on it. These are the names of the jewels: A ruby, a topaz and a beryl in the first row.
korean_text: 그것에 네 줄 보석을 물렸으니 곧 홍보석 황옥 녹주옥이 첫 줄이요

sentences.original_text: Then they fixed four rows of jewels on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 위에 네 줄의 보석을 고정시켰습니다

sentences.original_text: These are the names of the jewels
A ruby, a topaz and a beryl
